channel.title: Latest iXat Source [Last Update: 10th July]
channel.description:
[center]iXat Source[/center] ________________________________________________________________________________________ [Plesae don't complain about this being in the "wrong" section, Xat is apart of RSPS now. believe it or not, if you want to move the thread, move it. Idc] [center] This source includes:
- Most stable, secure ixat server - Unregistered (guest) system (yes, it's secure) - MANY bug-fixes - Custom backend, and many more features
You should figure out yourself how to create an iXat server yourself,as it's simple and vibrant. [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/izf3q2cdsqn55ha/xatech.rar]Download Here [Mediafire][/url] Note: with the iXat source, edit /trade/_class/core.php and change getpowerbyid to match this http://prntscr.com/1eji8f [i][Note: Not my source, just releasing it for the community][/i] Enjoy! :D [/center]

item.title: Latest iXat Source [Last Update: 10th July]

[center]iXat Source[/center]

[Plesae don’t complain about this being in the “wrong” section, Xat is apart of RSPS now. believe it or not, if you want to move the thread, move it. Idc]

This source includes:

- Most stable, secure ixat server - Unregistered (guest) system (yes, it's secure) - MANY bug-fixes - Custom backend, and many more features
You should figure out yourself how to create an iXat server yourself,as it's simple and vibrant.
